title: CAREER IMPACT
content: Graduates of the D3 Railway Transportation Management program have extensive career opportunities in the national and international railway sectors. They can work for railway operators, logistics companies, transportation departments, or as transportation consultants. With expertise in operational management, service planning, and transportation data analysis, graduates contribute to improving the efficiency and safety of railway systems. The competencies gained also provide opportunities for further career development in both public and private sectors, making them a vital part of the effort to develop modern and sustainable railway transportation.
